resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?
The Choreo Music Helper is intended to support anybody who wants to perform to a specific music. It cuts a song into smaller tracks to train specific parts at different speeds.
Note: the end time is the beginning of the next track and can only be configured at the next track.
There already exists a track at position %1$02d:%2$02d:\n%3$s

If you are training to the song, you probably need some time between each iteration to go back to your starting position. Add some time before and after the loop to do so, the lead-in time also applies if you start a track.
Create a loop by selecting the start (A) and the end track (B). As long as there are A and B selected, the loop is active.
Split a song with this button into smaller tracks. A track has always only a start, the end is defined by the next track.
